devdoc.author: Team: Jessica Marshall, Ashoka Finley
devdoc.details: This contract is initialized by the Project Registry contract with the address of a valid TokenRegistry, and ReputationRegistry.

params._passed: Boolean describing the validation state the task should be claimable for.

markTaskComplete().details: Only callable by the Project Registry

setTaskReward(uint256,uint256,address).details: Only callable by the ReputationRegistry or ProjectRegistry

params._claimer: Address of account who has claimed the task

setValidationEntryFee(uint256).details: Only callable by the Project Registry

setValidator(address,uint256).details: Only callable by the Token Registry

params._validationVal: Flag for positive or negative validation

setWeighting(uint256).details: Only callable by the Project Registry

setup(bytes32,address,address).details: Used for proxy deployment of this contract.

params._hash: Hash of the tasks Description and Weighting

devdoc.title: Task Contract for Distribute Network

getValidatorIndex(address).notice: Return the validator validationindex of validator at `_validator`

getValidatorStatus(address).notice: Return the validator status (affirmative or negative) of validator at `_validator`

markTaskClaimable(bool).notice: Marks a task claimable by the correct or only validators. Determines if the task reward is claimableByRep for the reputation holder who initially claimed the task.

setPollId(uint256).notice: Sets the PLCR poll id of the current task

setTaskReward(uint256,uint256,address).notice: Set the ether reward of the task to `weiVal` and the required reputation to claim to `_reputationVal`, with the address of the claimer `_claimer`

setValidationEntryFee(uint256).notice: Sets the entry fee for validation

setValidator(address,uint256).notice: Set a validator of the current task,

setValidatorIndex(address).notice: Clear the validator stake of validator at `_validator`

setWeighting(uint256).notice: Set the weighting of the task to `_weighting` which represent the proportion of the project cost it represents

setup(bytes32,address,address).notice: Initialize a task related to a project with a hash of the description and weighting `_hash` and the addresses of the TokenRegistry `_tokenRegistry` and ReputationRegistry

userdoc.notice: This contract manages a single task for a project
